tagline: Digital Publisher Micropayments, Up and Running in Hours!

features.title: Easily collect small amounts of money
features.text: By just dropping our javascript library onto your pages, you can begin charging for your content, we'll handle all the setup.

features.title: Provide a seamless user experience
features.text: Users can send you a micropayment with a single click to reveal content, hide advertisements, or sign up for newsletters.

features.title: The smallest transaction fees
features.text: Credit cards and processing fees are a huge obstacle in the path towards micro-payments for content publishers. That all ends, now!
